Uses of Class
es.uam.eps.ir.relison.sna.metrics.pair.AbstractPairMetric

Packages that use AbstractPairMetric 
Package Description
es.uam.eps.ir.relison.sna.metrics.complementary.pair
Social network analysis metrics for pairs of users on the complementary graph (independently of the fact that a link exists).
es.uam.eps.ir.relison.sna.metrics.distance
Distance-based metrics.
es.uam.eps.ir.relison.sna.metrics.distance.pair
Distance-based metrics for individual pairs of nodes in the network.
es.uam.eps.ir.relison.sna.metrics.pair
Social network analysis metrics for pairs of users (independently of the fact that a link exists).

    class  ComplementaryEmbededness<V>
    Computes the embeddedness the edges in the complementary of a graph.
    class  ComplementaryNeighbourOverlap<U>
    Computes the intersection between the neighborhoods of two nodes in the complementary graph.

  • Uses of AbstractPairMetric in es.uam.eps.ir.relison.sna.metrics.distance

    Modifier and Type Class Description
    class  ShrinkingDiameterNeighbors<U>
    Computes the variation of the average shortest path length between the neighbors of a pair of nodes if the link was added to the graph.

  • Uses of AbstractPairMetric in es.uam.eps.ir.relison.sna.metrics.distance.pair

    Subclasses of AbstractPairMetric in es.uam.eps.ir.relison.sna.metrics.distance.pair 
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    class  Distance<U>
    Computes the distance between nodes.
    class  Geodesics<U>
    Measures the number of geodesic paths between two different nodes in the network.
    class  ReciprocalShortestPathLength<U>
    Computes the Reciprocal Shortest Path Length.
    class  ShrinkingASL<U>
    Computes the variation of the average shortest path length if a link is included in the graph.
    class  ShrinkingASLNeighbors<U>
    Computes the variation of the average shortest path length between the neighbors of a pair of nodes if the link was added to the graph.
    class  ShrinkingDiameter<U>
    Computes the variation of the diameter if a link is included in the graph.

    Modifier and Type Class Description
    class  ClusteringCoefficientIncrement<U>
    Computes the increment of clustering coefficient if a link is added.
    class  DistanceWithoutLink<U>
    Computes the distance between two nodes in the network, considering that the link does not exist.
    class  EdgeWeight<V>
    Finds the weight of an edge in a graph.
    class  Embededness<U>
    Computes the embeddedness the pairs of nodes of a graph.
    class  Weakness<U>
    Computes the weakness of the pairs of nodes of a graph.
    class  WeightedNeighborOverlap<U>
    Computes the intersection between the neighborhoods of two nodes.
